# ElectricityGuidance.SuggestedAction.reduce

**Case**

An indication of when to reduce electricity usage for devices that can reduce electricity consumption.

## Declaration

```swift
case reduce
```

## Discussion

For example, an HVAC system can reduce electricity consumption by adjusting setpoints.

## Suggesting electrical load usage

- **ElectricityGuidance.SuggestedAction.shift**: An indication of when to shift energy usage for devices that can’t reduce electricity consumption.
